title: Chocolate Lab Double-Sided Garden Flag, Save the Earth, Dog Lover's Decor, Eco Conscious Gifts, Earth Day, Labrador Lover, double sided flag by TheCharmedCardinal
description: Show your love for our planet and furry friends with this ‘Save the Earth, It’s the Only Planet with Dogs’ double-sided garden flag! Featuring an adorable chocolate lab, this flag is perfect for dog lovers and environmentalists alike. Made from durable, weather-resistant fabric, it’s designed to brighten up your garden or yard while spreading an important message. Celebrate nature and your four-legged companions in style! Perfect gift for dog lovers or as a delightful addition to your outdoor decor. Original design, hand drawn without AI.

title: Garden Flag - "Bring Back Human Decency" Floral Decorative Banner by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
This garden and house banner brings a quiet, grounded statement to your porch, patio, or entryway. Rich, hand-drawn floral motifs curl across a deep backdrop while warm, hand-lettered text reads BRING BACK HUMAN DECENCY — a gentle but clear reminder that good manners and kindness still matter. The lightweight poly poplin-canvas hangs easily from a standard flagpole sleeve, flips cleanly on both sides, and keeps colors bright season after season. It settles into small gatherings, neighborhood strolls, or everyday moments at home where thoughtful reminders feel right.
Product features
- 100% poly poplin-canvas fabric — lightweight yet durable
- Vibrant, crisp full-color printing for bold, long-lasting hues
- Top sleeve fits standard garden flagpoles or stands
- Double-sided print (flipped on long edge) for consistent display
- Available in two sizes: 12" × 18" and 24.5" × 32"
Care instructions
- Clean by wiping with a soft, damp cloth.

title: Garden Flag "It's Not Hoarding, It's Plants" Decorative House & Garden Banner, Plant Enthusiast Gift, Plant Parent, Housewarming Gift by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
A charming garden and house banner that brings soft, indoor-jungle energy to porches, patios, and windowsills. The design features a row of potted houseplants in warm, muted tones with the playful script “It’s Not Hoarding If it’s Plants,” creating a cozy, slightly cheeky statement for fellow plant lovers. Printed on both sides so the artwork reads clearly from either angle, the banner’s lightweight poly poplin-canvas keeps colors bright while remaining easy to hang. Slip it onto a standard garden flag pole or display stand and watch it add personality to entryways, garden paths, or sunlit nooks where plant collections live and grow. Original and hand drawn without the use of AI.
Product features
- 100% poly poplin-canvas for lightweight durability
- Vibrant, crisp double-sided printing (design flipped on long edge)
- Top sleeve fits standard garden flag poles or stands
- Available in two sizes: 12×18" and 24.5×32"
- Black inside lining; pole/hooks not included
Care instructions
- Clean by wiping with a soft, damp cloth.

title: Happy Holidays Doormat - Festive Welcome Mat with Retro Camper Design by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
Crunchy coconut coir fibers welcome guests with a warm, homey smile. This outdoor doormat brings a touch of vintage holiday charm—softly weathered text and a retro ornament motif—while standing up to muddy shoes and wet boots. Slide it in front of a porch light or tuck it under an awning; the dense Grade-A tufted coir scrapes dirt and traps debris, and the black vinyl anti-slip backing keeps the mat steady on stoops, steps, and entryways. Assembled in the USA from globally sourced parts, it’s a simple way to set a cozy seasonal tone every time the door opens.
Product features
- Grade-A tufted coconut coir for effective scraping and natural durability
- Black vinyl anti-slip backing keeps the mat securely in place
- Sized 24" × 16" (61cm x 40.6cm) — fits most standard doorways
- Designed mainly for outdoor use; resists moisture and wear
- Assembled in the USA using globally sourced components
Care instructions
- Place your mat in a covered, weather-protected area such as under an overhang, awning or portico. Do not expose to direct sunlight or excessive moisture. Because these mats are made with natural coir fibers, there may be some initial shedding over the first month of use, it can be easily removed by occasionally shaking the mat to get rid of the loose fibers.

title: Kindness Equality Inclusion Diversity Peace Love Garden Flag Rainbow Inspirational House Banner by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
Bright, lightweight garden and house banner that brings a gentle, inclusive message to your porch, garden, or entryway. Printed on both sides in vivid, rainbow-hued script that reads like a handwritten mantra — “Kindness, Equality, Inclusion, Diversity, Peace, Love.” The slim sleeve at the top slips onto standard garden flag poles or small stands so the banner hangs with a clean, vertical presence. The poplin-canvas fabric feels breezy in a summer wind and holds color well, while the subtle black inner lining prevents show-through for a crisp look from either side. Two sizes let you choose a small accent for a planter or a larger statement for a walkway or balcony.
Product features
- 100% poly poplin-canvas fabric — lightweight with fine warp and thicker weft for durability
- Vibrant, high-definition printing with bright, crisp colors
- Sleeve at top fits standard garden flagpoles or stands (pole/hooks not included)
- Printed on both sides with design flipped on long edge for vertical orientation
- Available in two sizes: 12"×18" and 24.5"×32"; black inner lining to reduce show-through
Care instructions
- Clean by wiping with a soft, damp cloth.

title: Leave the Leaves Info-Graphic Garden Flag, Firefly, Butterfly, Salamander and Caterpillar appreciation, eco awareness, nature lovers gift by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
Leave the Leaves Info-Graphic Garden Flag, Firefly, Butterfly, Salamander and Caterpillar appreciation, eco awareness, nature lovers gift
Inform passersby why you’ve chosen to Leave the Leaves! This garden flag is your go-to choice for versatile and durable outdoor decor. Transform your garden into a sanctuary of nature with our "Leave the Leaves" Info-Graphic Garden Flag. This eco-friendly masterpiece not only adds a touch of beauty to your outdoor space but also plays a crucial role in protecting the butterflies that call it home. Featuring a vibrant design that highlights the importance of maintaining micro habitats, this flag serves as both decoration and education—a charming reminder to let fallen leaves nurture the life around you. Crafted from sustainable materials, it’s more than just a flag; it’s a commitment to preserving biodiversity. Each gentle flutter in the wind underscores your dedication to the planet's delicate balance. Let your garden flourish while you inspire others to embrace a greener world.
*Educational Information provided by the National Wildlife Federation Action Fund *
Product features
- 100% poly poplin-canvas fabric for a lightweight, durable banner
- Vibrant, crisp full-color printing using modern techniques
- Printed on both sides with design flipped along the long edge
- Top sleeve for easy slipping onto standard garden flagpoles or stands
- Available in two sizes: 12"×18" and 24.5"×32" (pole/hooks not included)
Care instructions
- Clean by wiping with a soft, damp cloth.

title: Plant Lover Tote Bag - Colorful Potted Houseplants Print by TheCharmedCardinal
description:
Carry a little indoor jungle wherever you go. This sturdy tote features a row of hand-drawn potted houseplants across a crisp white canvas, giving a fresh, calming pop to your daily errands or weekend market runs. The medium-weight polyester keeps the print vibrant and the bag holding its shape, while boxed corners add roomy depth for groceries, books, or plant-shop finds. Reinforced handle stitching and a non-woven laminate interior mean this bag stands up to repeated use — like a reliable companion for plant lovers who move between city apartments, community gardens, and cozy living rooms. The playful pot colors and varied foliage bring a quiet, green energy that fits into plant-swap meetups, weekend nurseries, or simply brightening a commute.
Product features
- 100% medium-weight polyester body (200 g/m²) for durability and vivid prints
- Boxed corners for extra carrying room
- Reinforced double-stitched handles for added strength
- Non-woven laminated interior with cotton handles; five handle color options
- Available in three sizes; size tolerance ±0.75" (1.9 cm)
Care instructions
- Remove all items from the bag before cleaning. Suggested to pretreat visible stains with stain remover. Mix warm water with laundry detergent and clean the bag with terry washcloth or a soft bristle brush. Let the bag air dry.
